name: Card, Gift, Novelty, and Souvenir Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell gifts and novelty items, greeting cards, balloons,
souvenirs, holiday decorations, stationery, wrapping paper and bows,
photo albums, and a limited selection of office supplies such as pens,
notebooks, and calendars.
For merchants that primarily sell office and school supplies, use MCC
5943.
